text:
The <fileset> element of <path> does not support specifying a set of 
directories to be added to the path, only files (e.g., jar files) 
can be specified using a <fileset>.

I hve a set directories of the form apps/*/classes that I need to add in a path 
definition and with the current behavior it is not possible.
creator: j_a_fernandez@yahoo.com

text:
I think I've implemented this capability (added a new datatype, <dirset>).
I've tested it, in the sense of having a build file with a <dirset> as a
child of project, nested in a <path> (using the 'includes' attr, a nested
<include> element, and a 'refid' attr), and referenced in a <pathconvert>,
and everything looks to work fine (miracle! :) -- but, given my queasiness
about my Java, do you want to volunteer to review my coding and make sure
I've actually done it right? (Or anyone else want to?)
